The Five Felons were just strolling up when this incredible act happened!

=
Terminion: Hello.

He got ready to draw one of his weapons should he need t=
o.

Terminion: Hello friend.

Junk Man wasn't used to being serious. Since =
the 5 character limit started, it was tough to survive as a serious charact=
er, you just got ignored.

Junk Man: Ask him what side he's on.

Danny: No,=
 stupid, what side are WE on?

Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Cardhead=
 getting decapitated and disemboweled...

  ----- Original Message -----
  =
From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Saturday, August 03,=
 2002 1:07 PM
  Subject: Character Debut/Return...


        OOC:  Yesss, i=
t's here, my first character in this "restart".  God, I hate this damn rest=
art.  NBWRPG used to be so perfect...

        BIC: 

        A deserted st=
retch of land.  A sky, once a bright shade of blue, was now being replaced =
by a quick moving area of darkness.  Soon, rain started to fall and showere=
d the ground.  Thunder boomed as lightning pierced the sky.  As time flew b=
y, the storm raged on, getting more violent each minute.  The sky suddenly =
bloomed a dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of lightning struck the earth bel=
ow.  The wet mud that was once dirt spewed through the air, as a fist plung=
ed up from the ground!  Another streak of lightning met with the fist.  The=
re was an explosion of sparks, and then the ground started to shake vigorou=
sly.  The fist started rising out of the ground, and revealed an arm.  The =
arm kept rising, and then another fist and arm popped out of the ground.  S=
oon, a head was revealed.  The figure started forcing its way out of the gr=
ound.  The storm had reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground and r=
aging on madly.  Within a matter of long, never-ending minutes, the figure =
stood on two legs now.  The storm stopped just then, so suddenly.  Everythi=
ng seemed to stop at that moment.  The rain, everything, just disappeared. =
 The sky was blue, the sun was beaming, not a single cloud up there.  Calm =
as a sleeping baby.  The figure that stood on the land was hideous.  It was=
 almost two things merged into one.  One half was metallic, almost robotic.=
  The other half, was slimy, and organic, with a pincir for a hand.......

=
        ENTER SKULLETRON/SLAUGHTER...
